spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aboleth's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes two attacks.

action.name: Celestial Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) radiant damage. On a hit, the target can't make opportunityattacks against the deva until the beginning of the target's next turn.

bonus.name: Bonus
entries: Entries

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrall that the thrall can see hits an aboleth with an attack, the thrall can make itself the target of the attack instead.

legendary.name: Legendary action
entries: Entries for legendary action

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: When the empress fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. When she does so, leaves wilt off of her body.

trait.name: Mistress of Despair
entries: Each time the empress deals 16 or more necrotic and psychic damage to a creature it becomes {@condition frightened} of her. At the start of each of its turns a {@condition frightened} creature repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The empress regains 10 hit points at the beginning of each of her turns as long as she has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The empress attacks twice.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Vines
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage and 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage. If the target is Larger or smaller it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}).

bonus.name: Psychic Contortion
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition grappled} creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Sap Life (Recharge 6)
entries: When the empress hits a creature she is grappling with her slam, she regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt. No mundane plantlife grows in a 5-foot radius around the creature for the next {@dice 1d100} years.

legendary.name: Seedling
entries: The empress plants seeds within 20 feet that grow into 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) {@creature squashling|LevelUp|squashlings} which emerge at the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Vine
entries: The empress attacks with her vine.

legendary.name: Dance of Ruin (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The empress twirls and bounds, moving up to 25 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. At the end of her movement each non-plant creature within 60 feet makes a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage and 13 ({@damage 2d12}) psychic damage on a failure, or half damage on a success.

legendary.name: Growth (Costs 2 Actions, 2/Day)
entries: The empress tears a piece of herself free and throws it onto a patch of earth or soil within 60 feet. At the start of the next creature's turn it grows into a {@creature gourdling|LevelUp} that immediately attacks.

trait.name: Natural Artistry
entries: When making an ability check, the gourdling gains an expertise die for each gourdling working alongside it to accomplish the same task.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gourdling attacks twice.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Vines
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium-sized or smaller it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

bonus.name: Dread Rend
entries: When the gourdling hits a creature it is grappling with its slam, the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and it makes a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or is {@condition rattled|LevelUp} until the end of the creature's next turn.

reaction.name: Root Down (1/Day)
entries: When the gourdling would be reduced to 0 hit points, if it is touching a patch of earth or soil, it instead is reduced to 10 ({@dice 4d4}) hit points. No mundane plantlife grows in that patch for the next {@dice 1d10} years.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Seed Shot (Recharge 3-6)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage. A creature that takes 12 or more damage is {@condition rattled|LevelUp} until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Charming Aspect (2/Day)
entries: A creature within 30 feet that the squashling can see makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or becomes {@condition charmed} for 1 hour. At the end of each minute and whenever it takes damage the {@condition charmed} creature repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Fell Sustenance
entries: When the squashling takes necrotic or psychic damage it recharges the use of Seed Shot.
